violently.辛西婭：我知道，可是他反應不該那麼粗暴。Paul: What did the kindergarten teacher say?保羅：幼稚園老師怎麼說？Cynthia: She says that he plays well with the other children most of the time, but every now and then, when one of them annoys him, he flies into a rage, like this morning.辛西婭：她說約翰尼通常和其他孩子玩得很融洽，但有時被同學一激，就會勃然大怒，像今早那樣。 多學一點點 衝冠一怒為小熊 辛西婭談到約翰尼：He misbehaved at the kindergarten。Misbehave是「行為惡劣」，反義詞是behave，例如：(1) I will buy you an ice cream only if you behave (yourself)（你行為規矩，我才會買冰淇淋給你吃）。(2) Did the children misbehave (themselves) when I was not here?（我不在這裡的時候，孩子們有沒有不規矩？）Behave、misbehave之後用不用oneself這樣的反身代名詞(reflexive pronoun)都可以。約翰尼令辛西婭不高興的行為是：When one of the other kids picked up his teddy bear, he flew into a rage, snatched it back and started hitting him。Snatch是「迅速奪取」的意思，例如：He snatched my wallet and ran（他一把搶了我的錢包，拔腳就跑）。Fly into直譯是「飛進」，常用來說突然表現某種情緒，一般是憤怒的情緒，例如：(1) He flew into a passion/a temper when the waiter told him that they
